effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 480,251 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 254,418.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 206,503 damage and granting them 1,354 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 691,560, and grants you up to 10,397 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
